name: Silverfish
overview: One of the samples contained in "The Shoot Em Up Destruction Set" and also released in Commodore Zone #10. SILVERFISH is a 1 or 2 player sideways scrolling shoot 'em up heavily inspired by Silkworm. Player one controls a VTOL jet and player 2 can jump into the action at any time to provide ground support with an armoured jeep.
